name: Minimalist Mandala // An Aspirational Vision for My Universe
description: A Mandala is one's imaginary palace for contemplating the universe. Each object represents an aspect of wisdom or a principle.  Slow the mind, watch it turn, disappear then return. This Mandala is a breathing moving star of pastel polygons.
